description: The Sir John Loveridge Hall at Beau Sejour will be used until at least May to give Covid vaccines.
title: Covid-19: Guernsey sports concern over vaccination scheme venue
title_page: Covid-19: Guernsey sports concern over vaccination scheme venue - BBC News
maintext: The States of Guernsey said the hall had been selected because it met key requirements for operating the vaccine programme, all other options had been considered before selection and it was exploring all options to support displaced sports clubs.
